huáng
frightened

purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 皇 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
惶恐 [ huáng kǒng ]: terrified
惊惶 [ jīng huáng ]: panic-stricken
惶惑 [ huáng huò ]: anxious and perplexed; uneasy and confused; suspicious and fearful
惶惶 [ huáng huáng ]: alarmed; anxious
诚惶诚恐 [ chéng huáng chéng kǒng ]: in fear and trepidation (idiom); in reverence before your majesty (court formula of humility)

heisig_chinese_memo: All emperors have a fearful state of mind of being overthrown or murdered at some point.
Ru_trainchinese: huáng: (графема) испуганный, охваченный страхом, тревожный
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: All emperors have a fearful state of mind of being overthrown or murdered at some point.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " heart " to the " emperor " sound. The original meaning is fear and panic. "Said Wen": "Fear, fear. From the heart, the emperor's voice." "Guang Ya. Interpretation III: "Fear, fear." Such as "Warring States Policy. "Yan Ce III": "The King of Qin Fang returned to the post, and his soldiers were anxious and did not know what to do." "Han. "The Biography of Kuaiwu Jiangxifu": "So the children of your princes were apprehensive. They all bowed their heads and begged for condolences, and were willing to receive money for atonement."

" Fear " also expresses confusion and doubt. "Words. Heart Department: "Fear, confusion." Such as "Yanzi Chunqiu. Outer articles. "Heavy but different": "It is not right to be silent, and you are afraid of the king." Wang Niansun Magazine: "This word is synonymous with confusion, and it is also the case that fear of the king is confused by the son." "New Book. Dao Shu: "You will not be obscured by listening to the week, and you will not panic after checking."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " heart " to the " emperor " sound. The original meaning is fear and panic.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「皇」聲。本義是恐懼、驚慌。《說文》：「惶，恐也。从心，皇聲。」《廣雅．釋詁三》：「惶，懼也。」如《戰國策．燕策三》：「秦王方還柱走，卒惶急不知所為。」《漢書．蒯伍江息夫傳》：「於是貴戚子弟惶恐，皆見上叩頭求哀，願得入錢贖罪。」

　　「惶」又表示迷惑、疑惑。《字彙．心部》：「惶，惑也。」如《晏子春秋．外篇．重而異者》：「默然不對，恐君之惶也。」王念孫雜志：「此惶字與惑同義，言恐君為子之所惑也。」《新書．道術》：「周聽則不蔽，稽驗則不惶。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「皇」聲。本義是恐懼、驚慌。

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 皇 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
Freq: 2320
Chinese: All emperors have a fearful state of mind of being overthrown or murdered at some point.
Meaning: fearful
Story: All emperors have a fearful state of mind of being overthrown or murdered at some point.
Kind: both

從「 心 」，「 皇 」聲。本義是恐懼、驚慌。《說文》：「惶，恐也。从心，皇聲。」《廣雅．釋詁三》：「惶，懼也。」如《戰國策．燕策三》：「秦王方還柱走，卒惶急不知所為。」《漢書．蒯伍江息夫傳》：「於是貴戚子弟惶恐，皆見上叩頭求哀，願得入錢贖罪。」 「 惶 」又表示迷惑、疑惑。《字彙．心部》：「惶，惑也。」如《晏子春秋．外篇．重而異者》：「默然不對，恐君之惶也。」王念孫雜志：「此惶字與惑同義，言恐君為子之所惑也。」《新書．道術》：「周聽則不蔽，稽驗則不惶。」

Such as "Warring States Policy. "Yan Ce III": "The King of Qin Fang returned to the post, and his soldiers were anxious and did not know what to do." "Han. "The Biography of Kuaiwu Jiangxifu": "So the children of your princes were apprehensive. They all bowed their heads and begged for condolences, and were willing to receive money for atonement." " Fear" also expresses confusion and doubt. "Words. Heart Department: "Fear, confusion." Such as "Yanzi Chunqiu. Outer articles. "Heavy but different": "It is not right to be silent, and you are afraid of the king." Wang Niansun Magazine: "This word is synonymous with confusion, and it is also the case that fear of the king is confused by the son." "New Book. Dao Shu: "You will not be obscured by listening to the week, and you will not panic after checking."

惶字的基本解释

惶
huáng
恐惧：惶怖。惶恐。惶惧。惶惶。惶惑（疑惧）。惶窘。惶遽。惊惶。惶惶不可终日。

惶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huáng］
［《廣韻》胡光切，平唐，匣。］
(1)恐惧，惊慌。
(2)迷惑。
(3)方言。拒绝。
(4)通“遑”。暇。

惶字的英文翻译

◎ 惶惶
anxiety, fear

惶字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惶； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页392第32
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡光切，音皇。【說文】恐也。从心皇聲。【後漢·杜詩傳】蕭廣縱暴，百姓惶擾。　又【集韻】雨方切，音王。義同。　【說文》長箋】皇訓大，故从皇。通借用皇。漢書皇恐譌作主臣，艸書皇字之誤。

惶字的源字形

惶字的起名意思

从心，皇声。意指恐惧，惊慌。

Name meaning
From the heart, the emperor's voice. Means fear, panic.

心而感到有些惶恐。本义是恐惧、惊慌。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Сердце (10) выражает значение, форма печати подобна сердцу, которое выражает страх в сердце; император (худнг) выражает звук, император обладает великой праведностью, а люди склонны испытывать чувство благоговения. и страх перед великими вещами.
Первоначальный смысл - страх и паника.
